verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: will] make her second public appearance in a week on Wednesday , when she joins Trump at a FEMA briefing but she will not join him at his Celebration of America .

[ARG0: Melania Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: make] [ARG1: her second public appearance in a week] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] , [ARGM-TMP: when she joins Trump at a FEMA briefing but she will not join him at his Celebration of America] .

Melania Trump will make her second public appearance in a week on Wednesday , when [ARG0: she] [V: joins] [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-LOC: at a FEMA briefing] but she will not join him at his Celebration of America .
Melania Trump will make her second public appearance in a week on Wednesday , when she joins Trump at a FEMA briefing but she [V: will] not join him at his Celebration of America .

Melania Trump will make her second public appearance in a week on Wednesday , when she joins Trump at a FEMA briefing but [ARG0: she] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: join] [ARG1: him] [ARGM-LOC: at his Celebration of America] .
